item.title: Cloud Resume Challenge
item.description: What is a Cloud Resume? The Cloud Resume Challenge is a multiple step resume project which helps build and demonstrate skills fundamental to pursuing a career as an AWS Cloud Engineer. the project was first published by Forrest Brazeal. who works at A Cloud Guru, a cloud education company. Linkdin Here are the steps I took with a breakdown Certification I have finished the AWS training for Practitioners, and Solutions Architect.
